3.post_text:
Alert all Overwatch players! Think you have what it takes to beat the rest? Red Bull Coliseum Overwatch online qualifiers registration is now open! Qualifiers commence this Friday.

Total prize pool of Malaysian Ringgit 10,000 to be won! Finals will be held in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, in October 2017 (subsidized flights and full accommodation will be provided for qualifying SG team)! 

Gather your squad and register for free now @ http://esports.redbull.com.my/tournament/overwatch
#RedBullColiseum #ChargeAhead

Be rewarded when you choose 25% Less Sugar!

From now till November 15, 20 lucky winners stand a chance to win the brand new ASUS Zenfone 4 Max Pro. All you have to do is STAY CHARGED with Red Bull 25% Less Sugar. 

Purchase 6 cans to enter the draw - more details available on our website. Find out more today! http://www.redbullsingapore.com/promo-and-events

Promotion ends 15th November 2017, 11:59pm (GMT +8).

A Mom with 1 Big Boy (hubby) and 2 Mini Boys I got to stay vigilant and charge up with blasting Dynamic like Red Bull that never stops , thanks to Red Bull 25% Less Sugar allows me to stay alert and awake at all times !

Red Bull gives me the energy to last through the hectic hours in the kitchen. With the 25% less sugar option, I can cut down on my sugar intake too! Thank you Redbull!

Since my studies days, I have been drinking Red Bull to burn the midnight oil, as a working adult, I find it very helpful to give me the extra energy needed to pull through the day. I like the new 25% less sugar version as it is healthier and I  am not a fan of sweet stuffs. Love this drink, it give me wings.

Red bull have always been my favourite drink since young! It's so yummy and my siblings would fight for it whenever my mum bought it. My mum has always been nagging and reminding us to be mindful of the high sugar intake. Now, with the new redbull with 25% less sugar and the zero sugar option, It really helps and i'm relying on it to boost and accompany through my exam week and night studies. Red bull does indeed give me wings! Back to mugging again. Really give you wings!
Red Bull 25% less sugar keep me awakens on my work and always store up half dozen in my fridge at home and office.

I am defying gravity and you can't pull me down because I am too determined to be defeated and too optimistic to be fearful.

L-ess Sugar!!!

From now till November 15, 20 lucky winners stand a chance to win the brand new ASUS Zenfone 4 Max Pro. All you have to do is STAY CHARGED with Red Bull 25% Less Sugar. 

Purchase 6 cans of Red Bull 25% Less Sugar to enter the draw - more details available on our website. Find out more today at http://www.redbullsingapore.com/promo-and-events!

8.post_text:
We are so grateful to have loyal fans like JK and Jeremy from Power 98. It was great to see you guys!

Red Bull has been Powering Singapore Since 1982. As dietary needs and habits evolve, so does our offering. Now, you can Stay Charged with Red Bull 25% Less Sugar! A product specially created for the modern lifestyle.

12.post_text:
Join us tomorrow, Sep 9 at SportsMania @ Velocity for Red Bull Kickboxing Hour! From 3-4pm, Wallace Lu will help you kick your weekend into shape. 

Limited to 88 participants. Registration is FREE and starts from 2.15pm on-site, on a first come first served basis. Bring your friends and we'll see you there!

Be sure to look out for our Red Bull sampling girls, who will be happy to give you a cold can to fuel your work out.

#redbullworkouts #redbullsingapore

14.post_text:
In consideration of ongoing tournaments and to optimize scheduling with other CS:GO regional tournaments, we have revised the online qualifiers for Red Bull Coliseum CS:GO to 22nd-24th September 2017. 

Red Bull Coliseum CS:GO online qualifiers registration is now open. Total prize pool of Malaysian Ringgit 20,000 to be won! 

Finals in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, in October 2017 (subsidized flights and accommodation will be provided for qualifying Singaporean team)! 

Gather your team and register for free now @ http://esports.redbull.com.my/tournament/csgo #RedBullColiseum #ChargeAhead

15.post_text:
SportsMania @ Velocity is a 2 day festival for all sports addicts. Join us this Saturday, September 9 for the Red Bull Kickboxing Hour at 3-4pm. Kick start your weekend with our talented instructor and personal trainer - Wallace Lu. His classes are not for the faint-hearted!

Limited to 88 participants. Registration is FREE and starts from 2.15pm on-site, on a first come first served basis. Save the date, and bring your A-game. 

Be sure to look out for our Red Bull sampling girls, who will be happy to give you a cold can to fuel your work out.

#redbullworkouts #redbullsingapore

16.post_text:
Selamat Hari Raya Haji to all our Muslim fans! 

Stand a chance to win THREE pairs of tickets to see Gerhana Ska Cinta perform on Friday, September 8 at Esplanade Annexe Studio. This show is currently SOLD OUT so this is your last chance to secure a spot!

In an effort to support regional musicians, we are the official energy drink for this event, powering the band and crew behind the scenes. Free Red Bull will also be handed out to audience members, so make sure to grab a can and party the night away.

To enter this lucky draw:
- Like the Red Bull Singapore Facebook Page
- Like and Share this contest post on your wall (Remember to make it public!)
- Leave a comment below to tell us why we should pick you and tag a friend that you would love to attend this concert with.

Contest ends 5th September 2017, 11:59pm (GMT +8).

comments.message:
Thanks for your participation everyone! We have our winners! 
Hanis Husin
Blaquequeen Yani
Nadhir Zulindra Samón Abdul
You and your partners are going to experience Gerhana Ska Cinta live in Singapore this Friday!
I will bring my mum because she loves ska and everyday is mothers day! ❤️❤️ Paisalo Yawtla

Have been listening to their songs since my teenage years and Im totally disappointed that i missed the chance to get the tickets. Farhan Sahari and Ariff Faah is coming with me for sure. 

I would also want to give a shout-out to Global Entertainment Production for making this possible and my handsome friends Hassan Rosly and Shoop De-lang for working hard to get this event running.

Long live ska #angkat
This contest will be feature on our website, all the best!!!

so Sayang that we were'nt able to get our tickets earlier but i believe There'll Alwayz Be Sunshine and that will only be The Thing of The Past if i get to win this give away. The Sweet Melody of Gerhana Ska Cinta's lovely music will surely make you wanna Shake Yer Body. Andai nya ni bukan sebuah Mimpi SO CHOOSE ME AH anyway i want to Dance Wid Shaiful Hardy ah at this gig kekekekeke ✌🏽

Its the best opportunity to drag my cousins who were in the underground scene 12 years ago and revive again our skanking days. Gerhana ska cinta had definitely left an impact in our lives as we carry on with our careers now. So please pick me so i can reunite my cousins and make me feel like i'm 13years old again. Sha Mohd Faeeqah Eqa Ibrahim Mimilz Sebastian #2toneunite hahahahahaha

You guys should pick me as i really want to go on a concert date with my girlfriend and gerhana ska cinta was what made us together so we really want to reminicise the moment like our first time and its our first time gg to a concert together and confirm plus chop she will love me more when i win this tickets. This is my only last chance to see gerhana ska cinta live with my gf Nur Syarafana

I'd bring my dad. He listens to them everyday and I myself started to fall in love with them. My dad has has been working 6 days a week just to feed his 7 children and wife, I honestly think he needs a break. I wouldn't want to tag my dad because if I win, I'd want this to be a surprise for him. I was about to buy a ticket at carousell just for him and it got sold. Now, I have no idea where to get tickets except win this contest and better yet, I get to go too. I'm just trying my luck. I doubt I'd win this but it's worth the try.
it was suppose to be our first family concert but dang...

worst than breakup when ticket is sold out, i took halfday for this 😭

21.post_text:
#Repost @limyaoxiang 

It's not about having time but making time. 

Everyone has the same number of hours per day, it is what we choose to do with our time that makes the difference. 

@redbullsingapore celebrates 35 years in Singapore with a commemorative not-for-sale limited edition Red Bull G-Shock watch. Fans of Red Bull get a chance to win this exclusive timepiece with purchase of Red Bull Classic and Red Bull 25% Less Sugar. 

For more details on how to get your hands on this collector's timepiece, head over to @RedBullSingapore's website at www.redbullsingapore.com or visit their Facebook page at www.facebook.com/RedBullSingapore .

#RedBullSingapore
#RedBullMoments
